title: The Decline of Tsarism
creator_credit: Ian Thompson and University of Warwick
brief_description: Using archival footage, this program studies the military defeats and growing social unrest that resulted in the 1917 abdication of Tzar Nicholas II, ending the Romanov dynasty in Russia.
description: Using archival footage, this program studies the military defeats and growing social unrest that resulted in the 1917 abdication of Tzar Nicholas II, ending the Romanov dynasty in Russia.
